entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending before morning then cloudy. Snow inland overnight. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023
